headline: The Bull Case For Equifax (EFX) Could Change Following Launch of AI-Powered AML Compliance Platform
summary: On November 13, 2025, Equifax launched new AI-driven anti-money laundering (AML) compliance solutions designed to help regulated financial services businesses manage increasingly complex global sanctions screening, monitoring, and portfolio remediation requirements through a single, integrated platform. This new product combines artificial intelligence and manual analyst review to lower compliance risk, boost match accuracy, and increase efficiency for organizations facing rising regulatory...
